description:
A former genius jockey paralysed from waist down.
After meeting Gyro Zeppeli, an enigmatic outlaw, he discovers hope in the "spin" of the stell ball, which somehow enables him to move his legs again. Determined to uncover the secret of this phenomenon, he decides to participate in the Steel Ball Run Race alongside Gyro.
Riding horse: Slow Dancer
Source: Official page
name: Johnny Joestar
